駊駊駊

駊字的基本解释

駊
pǒ
〔駊騀（
?）〕ａ．马摇头，如“庭空六马入，駊駊扬旗旌。”ｂ．高大的样子，如“崇丘陵之駊駊兮。”

駊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pǒ］
［《廣韻》普火切，上果，滂。］
［《廣韻》布火切，上果，幫。］
见“駊騀”。

駊字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駊； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1435第25
【廣韻】布火切【集韻】補火切，?音跛。【玉篇】駊騀，馬搖頭。【廣韻】駊騀，馬惡行也。【杜甫·觀成都尹嚴公揚旗詩】庭空四馬入，駊騀揚旆旌。　又高大貌。【揚雄·甘泉賦】崇丘陵之駊騀。【註】與岥峨義通。　又【唐韻】【集韻】?普火切，音叵。義同。

駊字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
駊字的起名意思

暂无。

駊
Basic explanation of words
駊
pǒ
〔駊騀(
?)] a. The horse shook his head, such as "Six horses enter in the empty courtyard, and the flag is raised." b. Tall and tall, like "Chongqiuqiangxi."
駊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [pǒ]
["Guangyun" general fire cut, fruit on, puffy. ]
["Guangyun" cloth fire cut, fruit, help. ]
See "駊騀".
駊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【horse character department】　駊; Kangxi strokes: 15; page number: page 1435-25
[Guangyun] Fire-cutting cloth [Jiyun] Fire-filling and cutting, sound lame. [Jade articles] The horse shook his head. [Guang Yun] 駊騀, the horse is also evil. [Du Fu · Viewing Chengdu Yin Yan Gong Yang Qi Poem] Four horses enter the empty courtyard, and the sacred flag is raised.　And tall and handsome. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】Chongqing is a place of worship for hills and hills. [Note] It is connected with Yitong.　[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Pu Huo cut, sound mellow. The same meaning.
駊
